page.title: 09FOOD WE EAT AT WEEKENDS.
page.content: We did a survey on what people ate at weekends. Most people have cereal for breakfast on Saturday and Sunday with fresh orange to drink.On Sunday most people have a cooked meal with yorkshire puddings,joint and 2 vegatables.For puddings people had icecream, chocol- ate cake, strawberry and cream, pie, fruit salad and yogurt.A lot of people had snacks like chocolate, Fireballs, Gobstoppers,Mars Bars, Smarties, Maltesers and Jelly Babies. We like to drink things in cans like Coke, Quatro, Lucozade,Orange, Lemonade and Seven up. These are fizzy drinks. Mums and Dads like to drink wine and beer with meals at the weekend. When we do the shopping on Saturday we often go to a cafe for food. Often we eat fish and chips at the cafe with coke or milk shake to drink.
